title: Get Firefox for desktop — Firefox (US)
description: Get Firefox for Windows, Mac or Linux. Firefox is a free web browser backed by Mozilla, a non-profit dedicated to internet health and privacy.
text_excerpt: Get Firefox for desktop — Firefox (US) Help us improve your firefox.com experience In addition to Cookies necessary for this site to function, we’d like your permission to set some additional Cookies to better understand your browsing needs and improve your experience. Rest assured — we value your privacy. Accept All A
